languages.text: "Кровь вела Амик'Ардженту с рождения. Кровь же привела ее к сокровенному. Благословенны идущие по нити твердо!"
"Blood has guided Amic'Argenta since her birth. Blood has led her to that which is hidden. Blessed are those who steadily walk the thread!"
languages.original_text: "Кровь вела Амик'Ардженту с рождения. Кровь же привела ее к сокровенному. Благословенны идущие по нити твердо!"

traits.locale_text: "Blood has guided Amin'Argenta since her birth. Blood has led her to that which is hidden. Blessed are those who steadily walk the thread!"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Blood has guided Amic'Argenta since her birth. Blood has led her to that which is hidden. Blessed are those who steadily walk the thread!"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Das Blut führt Amic'Argenta seit ihrer Geburt. Das Blut hat sie zu dem geführt, was verborgen ist. Gesegnet sind jene, die stetig über den Faden wandeln!"
languages.original_text: "Blood has guided Amic'Argenta since her birth. Blood has led her to that which is hidden. Blessed are those who steadily walk the thread!"

traits.locale_text: "Das Blut führt Amic'Argenta seit ihrer Geburt. Das Blut hat sie zu dem geführt, was verborgen ist. Gesegnet sind jene, die stetig über den Faden wandeln!"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Le sang guide Amic'Argenta depuis sa naissance, et il l'a mise sur la piste de la vérité cachée. Bénis soient ceux qui arpentent vaillamment le fil ! »
languages.original_text: "Blood has guided Amic'Argenta since her birth. Blood has led her to that which is hidden. Blessed are those who steadily walk the thread!"

traits.locale_text: « Le sang guide Amic'Argenta depuis sa naissance, et il l'a mise sur la piste de la vérité cachée. Bénis soient ceux qui arpentent vaillamment le fil ! »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «La sangre ha guiado a Amic'Argenta desde que nació. La sangre la ha llevado a aquello que queda oculto. ¡Benditos los que caminan con paso firme por el hilo!».
languages.original_text: "Blood has guided Amic'Argenta since her birth. Blood has led her to that which is hidden. Blessed are those who steadily walk the thread!"

traits.locale_text: «La sangre ha guiado a Amic'Argenta desde que nació. La sangre la ha llevado a aquello que queda oculto. ¡Benditos los que caminan con paso firme por el hilo!».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「アルジェンタは生まれたときから血に導かれてきた。血は彼女を隠されたものへと導いてきた。糸を着実に歩む者は幸いである！」
languages.original_text: "Blood has guided Amic'Argenta since her birth. Blood has led her to that which is hidden. Blessed are those who steadily walk the thread!"

traits.locale_text: 「アルジェンタは生まれたときから血に導かれてきた。血は彼女を隠されたものへと導いてきた。糸を着実に歩む者は幸いである！」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “信者阿洁塔自从诞生的那一刻起，便一直被鲜血所指引，鲜血让她找到了隐藏的一切。沿着道路虔诚前进的人们，他们必将得到祝福！”
languages.original_text: "Blood has guided Amic'Argenta since her birth. Blood has led her to that which is hidden. Blessed are those who steadily walk the thread!"
